did.abstract: Correspondence from various Clark family members concerning property; finances; desertion; commodity prices in North Carolina during the Civil War and the operation of the salt works at Wilmington; experiences in Alatoona, Georgia, during and after the Civil War; an 1867 contract with a former slave; and family affairs, including a love letter from Lucetta Wilson.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Correspondence from various Clark family members concerning property; finances; desertion; commodity prices in North Carolina during the Civil War and the operation of the salt works at Wilmington; experiences in Alatoona, Georgia, during and after the Civil War; an 1867 contract with a former slave; and family affairs, including a love letter from Lucetta Wilson.
